panels.description: Cluster ID as provided by PVC.
panels.title: Cluster

panels.description: Cluster maintenance status.
panels.title: Maintenance

panels.description: List of faults in the cluster.
panels.title: Cluster Faults

panels.description: Current health percentage of the cluster.
panels.title: Cluster Health

panels.description: Health percentage history of the cluster.
panels.title: Cluster Health History

panels.description: Current primary coordinator node.
panels.title: Primary Node

panels.description: Current primary coordinator PVC version.
panels.title: Version

panels.description: Total nodes in the cluster.
panels.title: Nodes

panels.description: Total active VMs in the cluster (state is "start", "restart", "migrate", or "unmigrate").
panels.title: Active VMs

panels.description: Total storage OSDs in the cluster.
panels.title: OSDs

panels.description: Total storage volumes (VM disks) in the cluster.
panels.title: Volumes

panels.description: Current health percentage of each node in the cluster.
panels.title: Node Health

panels.description: Health percentage history of each node in the cluster.
panels.title: Node Health History

panels.description: Total PVC-managed networks in the cluster.
panels.title: Networks

panels.description: Total inactive VMs in the cluster (state is "disable", "shutdown", "stop", "provision", or "fail").
panels.title: Inactive VMs

panels.description: Total storage pools in the cluster.
panels.title: Pools

panels.description: Total storage volume snapshots in the cluster.
panels.title: Snapshots

panels.description: PVC Node Daemon state history of each node.
panels.title: Node Daemon States

panels.description: Domain state history of each node.
panels.title: Node Domain States

panels.description: History count of VMs in each VM state.
panels.title: VM States

panels.description: History count of OSDs in each OSD state.
panels.title: OSD States

panels.description: Current total CPU utilization of the cluster (n-1).
panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: Total CPU utilization history of the cluster (n-1).
panels.title: CPU Utilization History

panels.description: Current total Network utilization of the cluster (all active interfaces on all active nodes, full-duplex).
panels.title: Network Utilization

panels.description: Total Network utilization history of the cluster (all active interfaces on all active nodes, full-duplex).
panels.title: Network Utilization History

panels.description: Current total VM disk space utilization of the cluster (n-2 for copies=3).
panels.title: VM Disk Space Utilization

panels.description: Total VM disk space utilization history of the cluster (n-2 for copies=3).
panels.title: VM Disk Space Utilization History

panels.description: Current total real memory utilization of the cluster (n-1).
panels.title: Actual Memory Utilization

panels.description: Total real memory utilization history of the cluster (n-1).
panels.title: Actual Memory Utilization History

panels.description: Current total allocated (active VMs) memory utilization of the cluster (n-1).
panels.title: Allocated Memory Utilization

panels.description: Total allocated (active VMs) memory utilization history of the cluster (n-1).
panels.title: Allocated Memory Utilization History

panels.description: Current total provisioned (all VMs) memory utilization of the cluster (n-1).
panels.title: Provisioned Memory Utilization

panels.description: Total provisioned (all VMs) memory utilization history of the cluster (n-1).
panels.title: Provisioned Memory Utilization History

panels.description: Current CPU utilization of each node.
panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: CPU utilization history of each node.
panels.title: CPU Utilization History

panels.description: CPU load average history of each node (source metric).
panels.title: Load Average History

panels.description: Current network utilization of each node (total of all active interfaces, full-duplex).
panels.title: Network Utilization

panels.description: Network utilization history of each node (total of all active interfaces, full-duplex).
panels.title: Network Utilization History

panels.description: Network traffic history of each node (source metric, total of all active interfaces).
panels.title: Network Traffic History (+ RX/- TX)

panels.description: Current real memory utilization of each node.
panels.title: Actual Memory Utilization

panels.description: Real memory utilization history of each node.
panels.title: Actual Memory Utilization History

panels.description: Real memory history of each node (source metric).
panels.title: Actual Memory History

panels.description: Current allocated (active VMs) memory utilization of each node.
panels.title: Allocated Memory Utilization

panels.description: Allocated (active VMs) memory utilization history of each node.
panels.title: Allocated Memory Utilization History

panels.description: Allocated (active VMs) memory history of each node (source metric).
panels.title: Allocated Memory History

panels.description: Current provisioned (all VMs) memory utilization of each node.
panels.title: Provisioned Memory Utilization

panels.description: Provisioned (all VMs) memory utilization history of each node.
panels.title: Provisioned Memory Utilization History

panels.description: Provisioned (all VMs) memory history of each node (source metric).
panels.title: Provisioned Memory History

panels.description: Current disk space utilization of each Ceph pool.
panels.title: Pool Disk Space Utilization

panels.description: Disk space utilization history of each Ceph pool.
panels.title: Pool Disk Space Utilization History

panels.description: Disk space history of each Ceph pool (source metric).
panels.title: Pool Disk Space History

panels.description: Object count history of each Ceph pool.
panels.title: Pool Objects History

panels.description: Current disk space utilization of each Ceph OSD.
panels.title: OSD Disk Space Utilization

panels.description: Disk space utilization history of each Ceph OSD.
panels.title: OSD Disk Space Utilization History

panels.description: Disk space history of each Ceph OSD (source metric).
panels.title: OSD Disk Space History

panels.description: Total and per-OSD IOPS (I/O operations per second), read and write, in the cluster.
panels.title: IOPS (+ Read/- Write)

panels.description: Total and per-OSD data throughput per second, read and write, in the cluster.
panels.title: Data (+ Read/- Write)

panels.description: Average operation latency for Ceph OSD daemons in the cluster.
panels.title: OSD Latency

panels.description: Average operation latency for Ceph Monitor daemons in the cluster.
panels.title: Monitor Latency

panels.description: Current Zookeeper leader node; dynamic based on leader elections.
panels.title: Leader

panels.description: Current Zookeeper version; all metrics available only with version 3.8.0 and above.
panels.title: Version

panels.description: Number of Zookeeper nodes in the current Quorum.
panels.title: Quorum Size

panels.description: Total and alive per-coordinator Zookeeper connections.
panels.title: Connections

panels.description: Total approximate size of the Zookeeper database.
panels.title: Data Size

panels.description: Total number of znodes (keys) in the Zookeeper database.
panels.title: Znodes

panels.description: Average Zookeeper latency for each node.
panels.title: Average Latency

panels.description: Open Zookeeper file descriptors for each node.
panels.title: Open File Descriptors

panels.description: Average per-operation latency.
panels.title: Latency Breakdown

panels.description: Zookeeper data packet rate per second for each node.
panels.title: Data Packets (+ Recv/-Send)
